_PAGE_PLUGIN_CLOAK_INTRODUCTION_:
Introduction

ACloakPlugin is used to set default values for the props of the ACloak component. This allows centralized customization of the element's appearance and behavior, including alignment, size, text, and other properties.
_PAGE_PLUGIN_CLOAK_CONNECTION_:
Connection

To connect the plugin, add it to your project and configure default props:
_PAGE_PLUGIN_CLOAK_CONNECTION_NOTES_:
Notes

You can override the following properties:

  • align: Content alignment (default: "center").
  • extra: Object with parameters for translations.
  • size: Element size (default: 6).
  • tag: HTML tag for wrapping (default: "div").
  • text: Text displayed in the element (default: "_A_CLOAK_LOADING_").
  • textAlign: Text alignment (default: "right").
